comment.author: 25752562@N07
comment._content: The Kasr el-Nil bridge, crossing the Nile in central Cairo.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: This is another example of variant spelling of place names. As stated in the collection description, we transcribed from the descriptive text that appeared on the slide. Even on various websites the name is spelled both ways: www.egy.com/landmarks/00-11-01.shtml www.camelphotos.com/middle_east.html We’ll add the alternate spelling to our catalog record. Thanks!

comment.author: 97838606@N02
comment._content: that's how we pronounce it in Egypt.. Kasr En-Nile.. you wrote it as we pronounce it already.. thanks :D

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On June 21, 2013, aliabutaleb. suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
